name: Legend Of the Planar Gems
description:
Legend of the Planar Gems was made in about 3 weeks for a school assignment using UE4 and assets from itch and other sources online. Please play through it and let me know what you think.  

Click on Tutorial in the Main Menu for controls. 

Known Bugs: 

Strange scanline like visual bug

Load time from end of Demo to credits is longer than it should be.                                             (when game freezes after the boss platform its just loading in the credits, dont worry)
